title: Building Power Structures with Parker Jay-Pachirat | Layer Zero
itunes:title: Building Power Structures with Parker Jay-Pachirat | Layer Zero
description:
Parker Jay-Pachirat is a founding member of Boys Club and a venture capitalist at FinTech Collective.

Driven by data and challenging assumptions, Parker takes a deeply individual approach to the crypto space, studying systems and power structures at a broad scale.

Join us as we dive into the basement level of crypto, the philosophical and ideological levers that lay foundation for this political, cultural, and economic movement. 

------
📣 Galxe | Explore Crypto’s #1 Credential Network
https://bankless.cc/Galxe
